title: Router: Detect & Adapt (unstoppable)
description: Routes generic intents to detect/adapt packs, then to diagnose on failures.

content.mermaid:
flowchart TD
  U[User intent] --> D{Need repo analysis only?}
  D -->|yes| Intake[pack.detect_and_adapt.repo_intake.v1]
  D -->|no, execute goal| Goal[pack.detect_and_adapt.goal_runner.v1]
  Goal -->|success| Done[Done]
  Goal -->|fail| Diag[pack.diagnose.unstoppable.v1]
  Intake --> Done
  Diag --> Done
